description:
* Based on the http://anidb.net/cr747 [Clamp] manga Tsubasa: RESERVoir CHRoNiCLE.
Sakura, a princess from the Clow Kingdom, lost her memory due to a strange incident that happened within an archaeological dig in her home country. In order to regain her memory, Yukito, the Kingdom`s mage, sent her childhood best friend, Syaoran, to seek help from the witch, Yuuko. Yuuko tells Syaoran that he has to travel from one alternate reality to another to collect fragments of Sakura`s memory. However, even if Sakura regains her memory, she will have no recollection of Syaoran. Along the journey, Syaoran and Sakura meet Kurogane, a warrior who was exiled from his country, and Fay, a mage who wants to move from one reality to another in order to escape from his King. The four characters end up traveling together and an exciting journey through time and space begins.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
When Syaoran returns to his home for a change of clothes after studying the ruins, he meets his dearest and closest childhood friend Sakura, the princess of Clow Kingdom. She convinces him to stay longer, and the two wander the town shopping together. At the end of their excursion, she attempts to confess her love for him, but is interrupted and forced to return to the castle. When Syaoran returns to the ruins, he is surprised to find Sakura there. A mysterious force begins to draw her into the wall and causes her memories to manifest themselves in the form of feathers. When he pulls her to safety, her memories scatter across the dimensions. The priest Yukito tells him to seek out the help of the Dimensional Witch and sends the two to the dimension in which she resides. Upon arriving there, two others soon follow: Kurogane who is exiled from his dimension for killing excessively and Fai D. Flourite who is running away from the king of his dimension.
Source: Wikipedia.org

titles.title: การพบพานภายใต้พรหมลิขิต

REGULAR.description:
Transported to the modern day Japan, Syaoran, Kurogane, and Fai ask the Dimensional Witch, Yuuko Ichihara, to grant their wishes. Syaoran wishes to travel to many worlds to restore Sakura`s memories. Kurogane wishes to return to his own world. Fai wishes to travel to a world that is not his own so as to avoid meeting his king. Yuuko tells them that although their intentions are different, their wishes are the same. In order to have their wish granted, each must pay a price. She asks Syaoran to pay with his relationship with Sakura which would result in Sakura losing her memories of Syaoran, Kurogane to pay with his sword Ginryuu, and Fai to pay with the tattoo on his back. Though hesitant, each pays their respective price, and in return she gives the group a white creature named Mokona Modoki who holds the power to cross to random dimensions. The group sets off to another dimension where a gang war is about to commence between two groups led by Kanio and Shougo respectively who use a power called Kudan that can manifest itself as a familiar. A boy named Masayoshi finds them and brings them to safety. When Fai gives Syaoran one of Sakura`s feather, taking it off Syaoran`s shirt, the feather is blown by a stray blast. After running into the fray to retrieve the feather, Syaoran finds that he too possesses the power Kudan and interferes with the fight.
Source: Wikipedia.org

titles.title: พลังในการต่อสู้

REGULAR.description:
Sorata Arisugawa and Arashi Kishu find Syaoran, Fai, Kurogane, and Sakura (still unconscious but better) and take them to their apartment building. After some rest and less suspicious clothes, the three go around town looking for Sakura`s memory fragments. However, Kurogane spots someone who looks like Princess Tomoyo and chases after her. After losing sight of the girl as well as Syaoran and Fai, Kurogane meets the gang from before and a fight ensues.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: ดาบพิฆาตอสูร

REGULAR.description:
Sakura is awake and is checking out the town. However, she wakes up without Syaoran, Fai, Kurogane, and Mokona knowing it until it was too late. Things get worse when the leader of the invading gang recognizes her from his encounter with Syaoran and concocts a devious scheme.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: การรอนแรมอันพิสุทธิ์

REGULAR.description:
A dual between mages erupts at the castle of a teen pop star! Syaoran is soon forced into the battle, and the quest can’t continue until he defeats the local thugs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การต่อสู้ของพ่อมดจอมคาถา

REGULAR.description:
Syaoran battles the respected leader of the local street gang. Heroic deeds unlock the potential within the souls of the travelers - and within the timid heart of Masayoshi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: น้ำตาที่เก็บซ่อน

REGULAR.description:
In a new world, Syaoran tangles with the son of a cruel feudal lord. With a confrontation brewing, the group settles in with a spunky orphan who suspects them of being government spies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ของดูต่างหน้าที่แหลกสลาย

REGULAR.description:
As the oppressed citizens lay siege to the fortress of a ruthless lord and his despicable son, Sakura and Syaoran discover a dark secret within the castle walls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ลูกรักของพระเจ้า

REGULAR.description:
In a land where illusion can become concrete and pain is very real, Syaoran fights his way into the castle where a feather - and a startling threat - waits in the inner chambers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: นางพญาแห่งเหล่าภูติ

REGULAR.description:
As Syaoran battles the fierce son of the local warlord, Fai and Kurogane do their best to survive the attacks of a powerful sorceress.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: กระจกแห่งการอำลา

REGULAR.description:
After gaining control of the townsfolk, the feudal lord makes Syaoran a dark promise: Sakura will suffer greatly if the young archeologist chooses to battle the mesmerized citizens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: อนาคตที่ถูกเลือก

REGULAR.description:
Syaoran searches the depths of a vast lake for feathers and the princess begins to recover her memories - but recollections once inhabited by Syaoran now contain only shadows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: รอยยิ้มอันอบอุ่น

REGULAR.description:
Superstition and suspicion swirl in a snowy realm where children are vanishing. Late one night, Sakura sees something unbelievable through her window – and then, like the children, she disappears!
Source: crunchyroll

Held in a castle by a fabled spectral being, Sakura sees the missing children wandering the dusty halls. In the village, Syaoran questions the mayor – who is also a target of suspicion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ประวัติศาสตร์ที่แท้จริง

REGULAR.description:
Syaoran and his companions expose the truth behind the missing children. As disaster looms for Sakura within the castle, a ghostly presence reaches out to help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: จิตใจที่เชื่อมั่น

REGULAR.description:
The travelers appear in a land of magic users, and a tournament of heroes is underway. The group suspects the grand prize could be one of Sakura’s feathers.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความเข้มแข็งและ ความอ่อนโยน

REGULAR.description:
The quest for Sakura’s soul leads to a place of contradictions – Outo Country. While the day brings great hospitality, the night offers dangers that Syaoran and Kurogane must face head on.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Café im Land der Kirschblüten
Le pays des cerisiers en fleur
ร้านน้ำชาในดินแดนแห่งซากุระ

REGULAR.description:
A feather has landed in demon-plagued Outo Country. To collect information that may lead them to their goal, Syaoran and Kurogane throw themselves into action as demon hunters.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เจ้าเหมียวกับเจ้าโฮ่ง

REGULAR.description:
Outo Country is buzzing about a new breed of demon. When the beast attacks, Syaoran knows that he must learn a new fighting art or face the finality of death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความมุ่งมั่นที่จะมีชีวิต

REGULAR.description:
Kurogane teaches Syaoran to use a sword, and while Sakura minds the shop all alone, a beautiful visitor plays a song on Fai’s piano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: เปียในยามบ่าย

REGULAR.description:
The group suspects a feather’s influence is responsible for the new demon causing havoc in Outo Country, and the princess herself leads the hunters to the truth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: โฉมหน้าของอสูร

REGULAR.description:
The hunters gather to formulate a plan of attack to deal with the new demon. The confrontation will be tricky – the beast wears a very familiar human face
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ricordi che non possono essere cancellati
ความทรงจำที่ไม่อาจลบเลือน

REGULAR.description:
Syaoran and Kurogane arrive at the destroyed café to hear Mokona’s account of the battle. Suddenly, the stakes are much higher – Sakura’s life is in great danger.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ชีวิตที่ต้องตายจาก

REGULAR.description:
Players in a game of someone else’s design, Syaoran and the others close in on Sakura’s feather. The face of the supreme demon is revealed to all – and it is a thing of beauty.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Schwert des Kampfes auf Leben und Tod
คมดาบแห่งสมรภูมิเลือด

REGULAR.description:
The group faces a demon of unimaginable power as a gate creaks open between reality and dreams. Before the next chapter of this epic journey can begin, closure must be delivered on the edge of a blade.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ฝ่าวิกฤตเกมเสี่ยงตาย

REGULAR.description:
If the travelers reach the floating temple of a god, the unobtainable can be claimed. The climb is treacherous and many have lost their lives on the steep path to destiny.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความปรารถนาอันสูงสุด

SPECIAL.description: A recording of the audition of Jason Liebrecht for the role of Shaoran in the Funimation English language version.
A recording of the audition of Monica Rial for the role of Sakura in the Funimation English language version.
A recording of the audition of Christopher Sabat for the role of Kurogane in the Funimation English language version.
A recording of the audition of Vic Mignogna for the role of Fai in the Funimation English language version.
A recording of the audition of Carrie Savage for the role of Mokona in the Funimation English language version.
A recording of the audition of Carrie Savage for the role of Colleen Clinkenbeard in the Funimation English language version.

2778.name: slow when it comes to love

4327.name: be careful what you wish for

titles.title: สึบาสะ สงครามเทพข้ามมิติ
